Name: Utterance of Marvels: Part I
QuestDesc: Amidst a ripple of Reverberations, you hear the call... As you unravel your past, a new path unfolds before you, beckoning from the unknown.

Dialogues.Speaker: Blurry and Gentle Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Looks like drowning... Strange...

Dialogues.Speaker: Blurry and Gentle Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...No visible signs of trauma. Breathing seems... normal. Heart rate... should be fast... I think.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gentle Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You're awake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see! Let me see!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank goodness you're awake! Or I'll have to try my last-ditch move—Emergency Skills for Junior Patrollers, Lesson One: CPR!

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Erm, never did it on any living person though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gentle Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Chixia.

Dialogues.Speaker: Joyful Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, sorry. You just woke up, and here I am, chattin' up a storm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Gentle Female Voice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you alright? Do you feel any discomfort?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can call me Chixia... And, she's Yangyang!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are in the Gorges of Spirits. It's on the outskirts of Jinzhou, Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your attire doesn't seem local. Are you a roving traveler from afar, or... someone returning home?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you don't know why you're here, where you're from, or who you are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi didn't tell us you'd have these aftereffects when you wake up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The wind has brought us a warning. The Etheric Sea is converging. It seems a new Tacet Field is taking shape.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That means it's probably gonna get dangerous here soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, I knew it. Our gourds are out of service because of the Etheric Sea's influence. We can't send or receive messages for help now. We better hurry over to meet up with Baizhi at our gathering spot and get outta here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Guess you really can't recall a thing, but don't worry!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you got any questions, we can talk as we move. Yangyang and I will give you the full scoop, every little detail, from the get-go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover... can we call you that before you can remember your true name?

Options.PlotLineKey: You can call me that for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We shouldn't stay here. If you don't have other plans, how about leaving with us for now?

Options.PlotLineKey: Is there only one way out of the gorge?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, that's great! Let's go together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The terrain is complicated here, and we usually take that one route. If you don't mind, why don't we travel together for now? You can decide your future plans once we leave the gorge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, let's get going!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Awakening alongside Chixia and Yangyang, you find all your memories have been stripped away. You are a rover in this strange land, and this is the name they give you. As you try to gather your bearings, Yangyang invites you to join them just as a foreboding Tacet Field begins to unfurl its dark presence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, I know you can't remember a thing, but there's one thing I'm 90%... no, 100% sure about you! You must be a Resonator too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got a Tacet Mark on the back of your hand, and you have a <ano=Terminal>gourd</ano>. These are proofs you're a Resonator. Your gourd's design looks a bit different from the ones we use though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also, we have Resonators who can detect the formation of Tacet Fields nearby, like what Yangyang just did. She can tell all kinds of information by reading the Streams in the wind—that's her Resonance Ability.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —while I couldn't feel a thing, haha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, not many people are gonna hang out in the wilderness these days, unless they're Resonators.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, I know you can't remember a thing, but there's one thing I'm 90%... no, 100% sure about you! You must be a Resonator too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got a Tacet Mark on the back of your hand, and you have a <ano=Terminal>gourd</ano>. These are proofs you're a Resonator. Your gourd's design looks a bit different from the ones we use though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, not many people are gonna hang out in the wilderness these days, unless they're Resonators.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It may seem all nice and quiet here now, but you never know when a Tacet Discord might pop up outta nowhere!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, "speak of the devil".

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bravo! So you still remember how to fight despite having forgotten everything, wow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch me lead the charge next time! No one messes with Ma Xiaofa... Ahem, I mean Chixia!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's wrong? Are you injured from the fight?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You saw our Sentinel in your memories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, the one we built this statue for. The <ano=Oracle Engine>Sentinel</ano> in Jinzhou. There is one capital and six cities in Huanglong, with each city having its own Sentinel. While they share some similarities in appearance, there are also differences.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sentinel in Jinzhou is known as "Jué", manifesting in the form of a <ano=Dragon>Loong</ano>, like the statue you just saw.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the statue of Jué, the <ano=Oracle Engine>Sentinel</ano> in Jinzhou, in the shape of a <ano=dragon>Loong</ano>.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are one capital and six cities in Huanglong, with each city having its own Sentinel. While they share some similarities in appearance, there are also differences.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are there other Sentinels outside Huanglong?
What do the other Sentinels look like?
I saw myself standing face to face with it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sentinels are present where civilizations thrive. Huanglong stands out with the highest number of currently coexisting Sentinels, because of its long history and vast land.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Records state the Sentinels in Huanglong were once a single entity. Now they are each responsible for a part of Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Naturally, there are Sentinels in other regions too, but far fewer compared to Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In Huanglong, most of the Sentinels take the shape of a <ano=dragon>Loong</ano>. In other regions, they manifest in various forms...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were standing face to face with our Sentinel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One can hardly see our Sentinel with their own eyes. Most people only get the chance during the Appointment Ceremonies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to your description, you stood pretty close. Only the Sentinel's Appointed Resonator is allowed in its proximity; for now, that person is the <ano=highest official>Magistrate</ano> of Jinzhou...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa! Darn... That must be an Elite Class!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chixia might be in danger. Rover, please...!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you gaze at the statue, a vision of the Sentinel flickers in your mind. Just when you are about to ask Yangyang for an explanation, a cry of alarm sounds. Chixia is being attacked by an Elite Class Tacet Discord!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, watch out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe we should give your Terminal a whirl?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yay! It worked!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never seen a gourd quite like yours before, but it sure is working just fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was close! You fought so well!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I didn't even get a chance to help and Yangyang just rushed over to protect you like a ma...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, anyway, Yangyang was trying to shield you, and then BAM! The Tacet Discord was taken care of before I could get a good look!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Chixia.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... Oh, by the way, speaking of Baizhi!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're almost there! The place where we said we'd meet with Baizhi! She's the Resonator I've been talkin' about. Baizhi can heal with her Resonance Ability, and we found you together at the bottom of the gorge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi did some first-aid for you. You seemed to have drowned, but your airway was clear. Your clothes were dry and clean too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh and of course, it was Yangyang who investigated your clothes and mouth by feeling it through the Streams! She kept blushing and apologizing to you as she did while you were out cold.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chi-Chixia!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See? There's a Resonance Beacon over there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you see a Beacon, be sure to register and activate it. It's usually safe within a 5 meters radius of a Beacon. It can protect you from danger sometimes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, could you hand me your Terminal for a moment?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Done. Its design and system version are different from ours, but your Terminal still has the data transfer and other basic functions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are almost at the gorge's entrance. There will be a descent, but if your Terminal's Glider module still works, it will make things easier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will show you how to use it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once we're outta the gorge, there's only a short walk to reach Jinzhou!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou is the safest place round here. The Resonance Nexus provides coverage for the whole city. Besides, we've got a protective barrier and strong fortifications!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, maybe it's not as big as some other cities. BUT! Jinzhou is always the best place in my heart!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou sits between the Desorock Highland and the Norfall Barrens. It's a border city and a fortress. It's very crucial to the safety of Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? We've agreed to meet up with Baizhi here... Where is she?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the center of the Etheric Sea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...A Tacet Field?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...When did it show up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It wasn't here when we just got here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I didn't sense a hint of a Tacet Field's presence...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So it appeared while we weren't looking? Like, in the blink of an eye?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or maybe the Etheric Sea can tell where we are? Could it be following us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The center of this Tacet Field...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Isn't that Baizhi?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: BAIZHI!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are too far away. Perhaps she can't hear us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Freshly formed Tacet Fields have a Dormant period. During this time, it is relatively safe.

Options.PlotLineKey: You mean this Tacet Field is relatively "safe" now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dormant period of a Tacet Field varies based on its formation time. Generally, the shorter the formation time, the longer the Dormant period. However, with a longer Dormant period, Tacet Discords born within said Tacet Field are usually stronger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My apologies. I should have said it is "temporarily" safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dormant period of a Tacet Field varies based on its formation time. Generally, the shorter the formation time, the longer the Dormant period However, with a longer Dormant period, the Tacet Discords born within are usually stronger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We agreed to meet up 'round here, and she said she was off to collect some samples. Gosh, did she really go straight into the heart of a Tacet Field for that?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi wouldn't take such risks without careful consideration. Freshly formed Tacet Fields goes through a Dormant period.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The faster a Tacet Field forms, the longer its Dormant period lasts. For now, this Tacet Field should be safe.

Options.PlotLineKey: Hopefully we won't bump into Tacet Discords as soon as we get there.
Is there any chance that Baizhi down there is bait?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Accordin' to the <ano=Popular Shows in Jinzhou>Hero Plays</ano>, yes! There's a chance for that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: True, who could've set the bait, then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I see... the one who seems simple-minded in the group is actually the mastermind with schemes. That's another popular trope!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, wait... I'm not the mastermind!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I see... the one who seems gentle and quiet is actually the villain, hiding right under the protagonist's nose. That's a common trope, too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, wait... Yangyang isn't the villain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, that's not impossible, though...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some Tacet Discords can parrot human speech and behavior, namely the Whisperins. I doubt whether they can imitate a real person to this extent, though...

Options.PlotLineKey: Can we not go in there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right. The Glider can't carry us beyond the Tacet Field's range. Besides, Baizhi is there. We'll have to go down and see what is going on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon leaving the Gorges of Spirits, you encounter a newly-formed Tacet Field. In its center stands a woman named Baizhi, who appears to be engaged in an investigation. You decide to glide down there to meet her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now it’s time to use the Glider module. Rover, let me help you activate it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi! We're in a Dormant Tacet Field, right? Why did you come here by yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi, you know, we... huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are alright, it seems.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know, {Male=he;Female=she} was super energetic! Handled a super big TD! Way more spirited than me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been keeping an eye on {Male=his;Female=her} condition through the Streams...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi is just concerned about your condition. She must think we shouldn't be letting you move around that much, since you've just regained consciousness...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It isn't.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi is just concerned about your condition. She must think we shouldn't be letting you move around that much, since you've just regained consciousness...

Options.PlotLineKey: Oh, I suddenly feel sooo much pain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, would you look at that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you alright? Where does it hurt?

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Worry has clouded your judgement, Yangyang.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=His;Female=Her} vitals are stable, with normal-sized pupils and a steady breathing rhythm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...This isn't the place for talking. Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As soon as Baizhi sees you, she runs a diagnostic check on you. She urges you to leave the site immediately, but events unfold much faster than you expect...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang! Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're blocked outside. We can't get in. Are you alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover is with me. And... that strange Tacet Discord is here too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the Tacet Discord's ability.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Be careful.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang! Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you alright? Are you hurt?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh thank goodness! We could see that darn barrier, but couldn't lay a finger on it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm fine too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have never seen such a formidable Tacet Discord before, but Rover was able to completely defeat it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... didn't really do much. It was all thanks to you, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, what was that last move called? That looked as cool as Fiamma's killer move!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aww c'mon, stop being modest! So you didn't even go all out earlier. I saw how you took down that fella with both of my eyes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You made a couple kicks and that thing vanished into thin air!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's strange. This place isn't known to be so dangerous...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, come check this out!

Options.PlotLineKey: An illusion... left by the Tacet Discord?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, this is... an Echo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow! An Echo of the Elite Class... Someone got lucky today!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My apologies. We got a little carried away. Does "Reverberation" or "Echo" ring a bell to you, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything in our world is made up of frequencies, and every sound generates a reverberation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those "Echoes" are the lingering Reverberations of Tacet Discords after they disintegrate. We can absorb them into the Data Banks in our Pangu Terminals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, by Pangu Terminal, she means the gourd-shaped device every Resonator has, developed by researchers in Huanglong!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you see, it's not always we get to find these. Also, there's a limit to what your gourd can absorb.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absorption is only possible when your Data Bank's level is equal to or higher than the Tacet Discord's level. The Terminal can then convert its Reverberation into an "Echo" for use in battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My Terminal issued a warning when it detected that Tacet Discord earlier. It should at least be an Overlord Class.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, would you mind checking your Data Bank level?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need for that! Rover, why don't you just try absorbing it with your Terminal?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Oh. So it doesn't work.

Options.PlotLineKey: What will happen if I can't absorb it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries! You can start with smaller ones before tackling this guy here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There should be some sweet Baby Roseshrooms 'round here. Let's go check those out, shall we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It won't take long before the Reverberations disappear and the Etheric Sea vanishes. Once that happens, the Resonance Beacon signals will come back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Field will dissipate, biding time for its next resurgence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll need to report the unusual phenomena here to the City Hall and the Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's make our exit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discord you defeated leaves behind a lingering golden shadow. Chixia explains it is what's left behind when a Tacet Discord is destroyed, and it can be absorbed by a Pangu Terminal as an Echo to help in combat. You try to absorb it with your Terminal, to no avail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ughh... Hungry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm starving...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What... What kinda power is that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You been playin' the fool all along?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never seen a Resonance Ability quite like this. You got any other tricks up your sleeve? Like, eating a whole Tacet Discord? Grilling Echoes alive?

Options.PlotLineKey: I have no idea what happened.
It's not that different from eating it alive.
How does that relate to my cooking skills...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wasn't it your Resonance Ability?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could it be related to your lost memories? Can you recall anything now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. So what would a Tacet Discord taste like? Spicy? Sweet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard some folks tried to cook Gulpuffs, and they even made it a local speciality, didn't they?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which, Gulpuff's a type of Tacet Discord, too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm even more curious now... Anyway, spicy food is always the best!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, are you feeling alright? Any discomfort?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could it be the side effect of fighting that Tacet Discord? Baizhi, can we take Rover to do a check-up at Huaxu Academy's Resonance Medical Department...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Baizhi?

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absorbing Echoes with the human body is not entirely unprecedented.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the human body...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember Comprehensive Mirror for Historians mentioned this in the Huanglong section's opening...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: “... A celestial being descended, commanding the <ano=universe>Qiankun's</ano> boundless power. Assuming mortal form, they condensed the primordial essence, creating Pangu. Cleaving heaven and earth apart, they aligned the celestial and terrestrial. Their radiance encompassed the four corners. Thus began the illustrious annals of Huanglong, as provinces were first demarcated..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There was a very strong person way back. Like they held the whole universe right in their hands. As there was no Terminal in those days, they absorbed the Tacet Discords with their bare hands!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: and the TD they absorbed was the most powerful of all. That person turned it into the first Echo ever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then they used the power of that Echo to rebuild the world, sort out the laws, and that's how the history of Huanglong began...

Options.PlotLineKey: Chixia, you must know a lot about history.
What if I am that person...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually... I'm not, I hope I was though. That was just some old tales my parents used to tell me, kinda like the Sentinel's Appointment thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang's got an impressive memory for the ancient texts. Me? I just happen to roughly remember what the story's about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, Yangyang, stop reciting that! I'm beggin' you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, it's takin' me back to my school days, when I had to recite pages and pages of them... Anyway, that's just a made-up legend, isn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on, that was eons ago. Us Resonators do live a little longer, but we're still looking at 'bout a hundred years or so. And the known history of Huanglong stretches back at least a thousand years...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I may say, Rover, you seem quite "mysterious", too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's where the names "Pangu Terminal" and "Qiankun Data Bank" come from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whether it's true or not, that story happened a long time ago when Jinzhou didn't even exist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Could it be that Rover's like, the great-great-great-great-great-{Male=granddaddy;Female=granny} of us all?

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's not jump to conclusions without enough data and proper analysis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your ability to absorb the Echo with your own body leaves Chixia in awe. Ancient records, predating the founding of Huanglong and the invention of the Terminal, tell of a mysterious celestial being capable of absorbing the remnants of Tacet Discords. Legends speak of their influence in heralding the dawn of Huanglong's history.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait? The signal's back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is... a holographic message to all of Jinzhou from the City Hall.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My fellow soldiers and citizens, I apologize for any inconvenience caused. I am Jinhsi, the Magistrate of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the Moon-chasing Festival approaches, our city welcomes visitors from around the world. The festivities are highly anticipated by our people, and I, too, share in this joyful sentiment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou has always been a crucial defense against the Tacet Discord Outbreaks, safeguarding Huanglong. We have a heavy responsibility on our shoulders with no room for retreat or failure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is the dedication of our warriors, along with the diligence of our citizens, that has allowed us to thrive in peace and prosperity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite the challenges of Tacet Discords, we remain steadfast and hospitable to visitors, upholding our enduring traditions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With that in mind, I have a favor to ask.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Among our many visitors, there is one visitor that holds utmost importance to me, the City of Jinzhou, and the entirety of Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have awaited your arrival for a long time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Given the circumstances, you may be feeling bewildered at this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should have noticed some strange happenings related to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you plan to stay in Jinzhou for some time, I would be more than delighted to personally meet you in the City Hall of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While I cannot guarantee to provide all the answers you need, I will do my best to assist you and provide necessary permissions, if applicable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is only my personal request. You can decide your course of action in any way you see fit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Therefore, I request the people and soldiers of Jinzhou to assist this esteemed visitor when the opportunity arises.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the disrupting Tacet Field subdued, a holographic broadcast reaches all of Jinzhou. Jinhsi, the Magistrate, awaits an esteemed guest at City Hall and extends an invitation for a conversation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why do I get this feeling...

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This person our Magistrate was talking about...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...is Rover.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's still too early to tell.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, so this is the true measure of a Chief... I mean, of our Rover!

Options.PlotLineKey: What were you going to say?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "This is the true measure of a Chief!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a famous line from a good old Hero Play. It's been runnin' for almost four years! It's a really heart-warming tale about the Chief and their Squad.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Does that Hero Play story sound familiar to you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now you're talking a little like Baizhi, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Moon-chasing Festival and the Spring Loong Festival are the liveliest times in Huanglong. They're two of our most famous traditional festivals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every region in Huanglong will be celebrating the festivals in their unique ways. Jinzhou is a city built on the boarders, but it's no exception in that regard.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you curious about our Magistrate's title, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Magistrate's real name is "Hsi". Usually, the Sentinel selects a candidate during the Appointment Ceremony to become our Magistrate. They will then take on the city's name as their surname. This signifies their wholehearted dedication to the city and its people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, that ain't the point, okay?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are your plans now, Rover?

Options.PlotLineKey: Go meet the Magistrate at the City Hall.
I don't have any plans yet.
Take a look at those festivities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's still a while before the festival break. The best part of it hasn't even started!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're eagerly anticipating the festival atmosphere now, I'm afraid you will end up disappointed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you can stay in Jinzhou for a little while longer until the Moon-chasing Festival activities begin...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember you had a flashback of yourself looking into its eyes when you saw the statue of our Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We can't confirm its authenticity, but based on the Magistrate's message, it seems Jinzhou has a lot to do with your past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whether you're the visitor our Magistrate mentioned or not, you are surely important to Jinzhou, and you will be our important...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Friend!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've already entrusted our lives to each other. I've never seen so many TDs packed together, and that Elite one was so scary! Well, you did get rid of most of them, hehe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, once we're back in Jinzhou, I'll treat you to that famous specialty from Panhua's Restaurant.

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't have anywhere else to go anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your companions think you are the one whom Jinhsi is waiting for. The path ahead beckons towards Jinzhou, where your destiny will unfold.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It would be best for your well-being to have a thorough physical examination once we arrive in Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While there don't seem to be any immediate side effects following the absorption of that Echo, we cannot rule out the possibility of other latent risks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Given our lack of data on you and your unusual physical signs, I suggest absorbing another Reverberation with your Terminal when we find one. That being said, please be sure to proceed cautiously.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, don't go too hard on yourself. You should get a check-up just to be safe. Besides, Yangyang's very worried about you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you feel any discomfort along the way, please do let us know.
